sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>true</before>
        <description>Allow upgrade of two Pre-G mid-scripts. Prevent it from being skipped during upgrade.</description>
        <name>Allow Upgrade of Pre-G Mid Related Scrip</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var sysScriptGr = new GlideRecord('sys_script');
sysScriptGr.addQuery('sys_id', 'IN', ['2450c0003702120069da03488e41f1d5', '210c00803702120069da03488e41f1e4']);
sysScriptGr.addQuery('active', false);
sysScriptGr.query();

while (sysScriptGr.next()) {
	if (sysScriptGr.getValue('sys_mod_count') < 2) {
		var sysUpdateGr = new GlideRecord('sys_update_xml');
		sysUpdateGr.addQuery('name', sysScriptGr.getValue('sys_update_name'));
		sysUpdateGr.setValue('replace_on_upgrade', true);
		sysUpdateGr.updateMultiple();
	}
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>now.midServer</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-03-29 19:30:40</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>b83e77ba43f12110b99c734e3bb8f2b7</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Remove Pre-G Related Script</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="MID Server" source="com.glideapp.agent">a6877ce83cb1311068bcf327dfe37f69</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_b83e77ba43f12110b99c734e3bb8f2b7</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>now.midServer</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-03-29 19:30:40</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Allow Upgrade of Pre-G Mid Related Scrip
